snippet: CZAJKA--James Vincent, 65. The American Academy of Arts and Letters notes with sorrow the death of the gifted architect who for more than two decades designed and oversaw construction of many beautifully renovated spaces in the Academy's home on Audubon Terrace, including the Childe Hassam Gallery, the Members' Portrait Gallery, and the delightful Glass Link that provides access to a recently acquired adjoining building where he designed new exhibition galleries and the meticulously recreated Charles Ives Studio. Our thoughts go out to his family in Buffalo, NY. For information on a memorial in late May, contact: academy@artsandletters.org 1/3
